entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
